attributes.action: Stop Liz truss from cutting benefits for the lower class economy
attributes.additional_details: Because it will stop poverty and help people from being homeless and going destitute
attributes.background: I want parliament to up our benefits with inflation as promised by the then priminister Boris Johnson and rishi sunak !!!?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612152
